sources.title: MAN BEAST 1956
sources.description: Connie Hayward (Virginia Maynor) is concerned about her brother who disappeared during his scientific expedition into the Himalayas, where he was searching for the elusive yeti. Determined to find him, Connie sets out to scale the Himalayas and locate his camp. During her trek, she survives attacksÂ  by groups of vicious yetis. When she arrives at her brother's final campsite, she encounters a mysterious native guide, Varga (George Skaff), who harbors a sinister secret.
